column1: Smoque BBQ////this place ALWAYS has a line to get in
column2: and a long line.  then once in  you order
column3: they call your number someone helps you find a seat in the cafeteria type seating and eat and people watch.  this is the best place to get an awesome meal and people watch as it is packed.  best to experience eating in
column4: and then once you know the routine and want it
column5: call in your order and have it as a pick-up
column6: don't be fooled though even the pick up times can be a bit lengthy
